mapper.select: select DISTRICT_ID as districtId, DISTRICT_NAME as districtName, LEVEL as level, PARENT_ID as parentId, LIST as list from hr_district where district_id

SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_NAME as userName, USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, USER_SURE_NAME as userSureName, USER_MOBILE as userMobile, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, ROLE_ID as roleId, "Column" as "column" FROM HR_USER WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName }
